function_description: Edit project/board within the sidebar using a three-dot menu.
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and the sidebar is visible with the list of projects and boards.
steps: Locate the three-dot menu next to the project or board name in the sidebar.
Click on the menu to open editing options.
Select the desired edit option and make changes to the project or board.
expected_state: The project or board is updated according to the user's edits, reflecting the changes in the sidebar.
